溗字的基本解释

溗
chéng
水不流。
水波后波盖过前波。
水名。

溗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chéng］
［《廣韻》食陵切，平蒸，船。］
(1)水不流。
(2)叠波，水波前后相凌。
(3)水名。

溗字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　溗； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页639第25
【廣韻】食陵切【集韻】神陵切，?音繩。波前後相淩也。一曰水不流也。一曰水名。【集韻】或作?。 考證：〔【廣韻】【集韻】?音繩。波前後相?也。〕　謹照原文?改淩。

溗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
溗字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Faint
chéng
The water does not flow.
The back wave overwhelms the front wave.
Water name.
Faint
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chéng］
["Guangyun" Shiling cut, flat steamed, boat. ]
(1) The water does not flow.
(2) Stacked waves, water waves collide back and forth.
(3) Water name.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　溗; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 639 No. 25
[Guang Yun] Shi Ling cut [Ji Yun] Shen Ling cut, sound rope. The wave is also lingering. One said that the water does not flow. One is the name of the water. [Ji Yun] Or make?. Textual research: [[Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Sound rope. Before and after the wave? Also. 〕 　 Would you like to follow the original? Change Ling.
